alert.note: Alert for Tom Green (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 24 at 6:45PM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Tom Green County through 730 PM CDT... At 645 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Lake Nasworthy, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... San Angelo, Mereta, Veribest, Wall, Twin Buttes Reservoir, Lake Nasworthy, Harriet and Goodfellow Air Force Base. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for west central Texas.
